categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Nat Lariats was a female Nautolan Jedi padawan who served the Old Jedi Order during the final years of the Galactic Republic. During a light sword exercise in 22 BBY, she was approached by her classmate Nuru Kungurama, who gave her his practice light sword and ran away without giving her time to ask questions.
